hooks.command: echo '[Brain] Project Brain detected. CLAUDE.md loaded INIT.md. Check SESSION-HANDOFF.md and INDEX-MASTER.md before starting work.'

uv --directory project-brain run python -c "import rank_bm25; print('[Brain] Dependencies OK (rank-bm25 found)')" 2>/dev/null || echo '[Brain] WARNING: rank-bm25 missing — run: uv --directory project-brain pip install rank-bm25'
echo '[Brain] Context compaction imminent. Write SESSION-HANDOFF.md NOW — capture current state, uncommitted decisions, and what to reload after compaction.'

uv run python -c "import os,sys,time,json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); sa=data.get('stop_hook_active',False); path='project-brain/ops/SESSION-HANDOFF.md'; qpath='project-brain/ops/QUEUE.md'; ok=sa or (os.path.exists(path) and (time.time()-os.path.getmtime(path))<1800); msgs=[]; (msgs.append('SESSION-HANDOFF.md not written in the last 30 min. Run /brain-handoff before ending.') if not ok else None); (msgs.append('Tip: Run /brain-checkpoint to capture undeposited knowledge before ending.') if os.path.exists(qpath) and '_Empty' in open(qpath,encoding='utf-8').read() else None); [print(m,file=sys.stderr) for m in msgs]; sys.exit(0)"

uv run python -c "import json,sys; data=json.load(sys.stdin); tool=data.get('tool_name',''); path=(data.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path','') if isinstance(data.get('tool_input'),dict) else '').replace(chr(92),'/'); print('[Brain] You modified a brain file. Update its fat index entry in INDEX-MASTER.md.') if 'project-brain/' in path and path.endswith('.md') and 'INDEX-MASTER' not in path and 'SESSION-HANDOFF' not in path and 'templates/' not in path else None"
